channel.title: So i guess this goes here
channel.description:
so ya i have no idea what im doing :P
all i want is a sever just for my self to play around with for i can get use to the basics.
so what would be the fastest way to get started?
also can you run and work on a server offline? my connection here is like LOLWTF slow.

item.title: So i guess this goes here
item.dc:creator: @crikk23 crikk23
item.description:
@crikk23 wrote:

[quote=“stickywicky, post:2, topic:370178”]yes go to the server download section download a 317 PI source and client then set the client ip to 127.0.0.1
this will allow only you to login
and edit :)[/quote]
eeer ya i downloaded this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6915.msg70691.html#msg70691

and ran the.jar file but when i try to login i get

couldn’t open output stream to log file name1-20101125.log

logging into (name1 *****)

your UID is :{some numbers}

server: Clienthandler: accepted from 127.0.0.1:64201
did not save name1
server:clienthandler: client name1 disconnected.

Read full topic
item.source: So i guess this goes here

item.title: So i guess this goes here
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

yes go to the server download section download a 317 PI source and client then set the client ip to 127.0.0.1
this will allow only you to login
and edit
